jd: From: Abdul mannan, Tech Brand Staffing info@techbrandstaffing.com Reply to: info@techbrandstaffing.com Must have a 10+ years of experience Java EE and oracle and CI/CD Hybrid/Local IBM SOA/IIB/ACE/ODM/Java Developer (15+) with Oracle, Git, CI/CD, Azure DevOps, Selenium/Cucumber/Playwright/JUnit/Test Left, MQ, ITX, Node.js/Angular experienceLocation: Richmond, VA(DMAS)Duration: 12 MonthsHybrid 2 days a week on site requiredIN PERSON INTERVIEWS ONLY! NO Exceptions!Skills:Extensive practical experience in building enterprise applications using Java EE technologies Required 5 YearsExpertise in Core Java concepts, such as OOP Design, Multi-Threading, Generics, Exception Handling, Collections, Java Reflection, Annotation, Required 5 YearsUnderstanding of relational database concepts with experience in Oracle Required 5 YearsExperience developing with Git Workflows Required 5 YearsExperience developing CI/CD pipelines and automation Required 3 YearsExperience using Azure DevOps Highly desired 2 YearsExperience with Testing Frameworks such as Selenium, Cucumber, Playwright, JUnit and an understanding of Test Left approach to development Highly desired 2 YearsExperience with IBM SOA products like IIB/ACE, ODM, WAS, MQ, and ITX Highly desired 2 YearsExperience with Front End Development using Node.js and Angular Nice to have 1 YearsJob Description:This position will serve as a senior BACK-END application developer for the DMAS Information Management Division in the design, development, and maintenance of Java/ JEE based applications.Extensive practical experience in building enterprise applications using Java EE technologies.Expertise in Core Java concepts, such as OOP Design, Multi-Threading, Generics, Exception Handling, Collections, Java Reflection, Annotation.Understanding of relational database concepts with experience in Oracle.Experience developing with Git Workflows.Experience developing CI/CD pipelines and automation.Experience using Azure DevOps.Experience with Testing Frameworks such as Selenium, Cucumber, Playwright, JUnit and an understanding of Test Left approach to development.Experience with IBM SOA products like IIB/ACE, ODM, WAS, MQ, and ITXExperience with Front End Development using Node.js and Angular.
